description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	

	New Features:

SLIDESNET-29834       Method to clear ChartDataCellFactory in Charts
SLIDESNET-33403       Setting Gap Width and Depth in 3D Column Chart

	Enhancement:

SLIDESNET-33119        The difference in normal and PdfA1b formats

	Investigations:

SLIDESNET-33424        Is Aspose.Slides supported by Windows Phone 7?
SLIDESNET-33426        Table Cell VerticalAlign Bottom

	Bugs:

 SLIDESNET-23684        NullReferenceException on loading presentation with charts
 SLIDESNET-30495        Font color and style changed in the exported PDF and thumbnails
 SLIDESNET-33137        Vertical (Category) Axis Major Gridlines failed to hide
 SLIDESNET-33244        ArgumentException on accessing presentation
 SLIDESNET-33298        AddEmptySlide with specified custom layout that has a placeholder failed
 SLIDESNET-33365        Hanging punctuation is not working on the right side of text
 SLIDESNET-33366        Wrong image scaling when exporting PPTX presentation into PDF
 SLIDESNET-33376        UnhandledException: Cannot find resource 'Aspose.Resources.GenBasR.ttf'
 SLIDESNET-33395        Font color is changed while using template
 SLIDESNET-33396        Text font height changes in cloned presentation
 SLIDESNET-33402        ArgumentException on accessing presentation
 SLIDESNET-33409        ArgumentException thrown when saving presentation
 SLIDESNET-33445        Converting pptx slides to images
 SLIDESNET-33464        Pdf generated using Aspose.Slides 6.2.0 has poor quality as compared to 5.2.0
 SLIDESNET-33480        Image (VML drawing) is missing
 SLIDESNET-33496        Chart missing in generated thumbnail
 SLIDESNET-33514        Scaling screen text size to 125% and getting thumbnails results in improper rendering
 SLIDESNET-33569        Slide 7 has wrong chart line shown
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
